meanings.definition: feebs (noun): a foolish or silly person
meanings.sent1: The little boy who always forgets his homework is such a feebs.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that feebs; he doesn't know what he's talking about.
meanings.sent3: The feebs tried to juggle eggs and ended up with a mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a feebs when she accidentally wore mismatched shoes to work.
meanings.sent5: The feebs in the comedy show made everyone laugh with his silly antics.

meanings.definition: feebs (verb): to act foolishly or incompetently
meanings.sent1: Please don't feebs around and focus on your work.

meanings.sent3: The magician feebsed up his trick and made the rabbit disappear for real.

meanings.definition: feebs (adjective): lacking intelligence or common sense
meanings.sent1: His feebs mistake cost the team the game.
